overview.en: Mirrored Amazon (mAMZN) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Mirrored Amazon has a current supply of 8,316.348102. The last known price of Mirrored Amazon is 3,159.28591394 USD and is down -1.05 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $66,579.19 traded over the last 24 hours.
